alert.note: Alert for Independence; Jackson; Lonoke; Prairie; White; Woodruff (Arkansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued November 04 at 11:49PM CDT until November 05 at 12:15AM CDT by NWS Little Rock
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1215 AM CDT FOR WESTERN WOODRUFF...SOUTH CENTRAL INDEPENDENCE...NORTHERN PRAIRIE...SOUTHERN JACKSON...NORTHEASTERN LONOKE AND WHITE COUNTIES... At 1149 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Searcy to Higginson to near Thurman, moving northeast at 65 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Searcy... Lonoke... Augusta... Des Arc... Bald Knob... Judsonia... Kensett... Higginson... Patterson... Russell... West Point... Tupelo... Barrettsville... Crosby... Thurman... Pryor... Hurricane Lake WMA... Steprock... McRae... Sisemore... HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: A Tornado Watch remains in effect until midnight CDT for north central Arkansas. A Tornado Watch also remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for eastern, central and north central Arkansas. For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.

area.areaDesc: Independence; Jackson; Lonoke; Prairie; White; Woodruff
